channel.title: [PI] Little help showing levels
channel.description:
Hello reader
I've recently downloaded a PI source and client and added the sprites for Construction, Dungeoneering, Hunter and Summoning for it. Now they all get showed properly, but it doesn't show the level (as in 1/1 or 99/99). Any help regarding this? Would be great.
Sincerely
JavaLearner

item.title: [PI] Little help showing levels
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

I added it to the process method, still no use

EDIT: I got it to work! Thanks for the response 3lv3n snip3r, I’d rep if I could

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Little help showing levels

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Add this:

In your process method in your client class.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Little help showing levels
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Do you happen to know which part of the code makes sure it shows those levels? I don’t like to just copy/paste code without knowing exactly what I’m doing. I’m mainly doing this to learn, so just copy/paste wouldn’t really help me.

Regards

EDIT: I got the levels working, but they only show for about half a second the first time you log in with an account, after that they vanish. Any thoughts?

Read full topic
